EmailTemplate.subject: 4 Steps to Building Data-Driven IoT Applications
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Internet of Things (IoT) will forever change the way businesses interact with consumers and each other. The fastest, most effective way to take advantage of the Internet of Things is to evolve application development to specifically address how IoT applications will report data from, prescribe actions for and control connected devices.
Download the 4-step primer <http://pivotal.io/building-iot-applications>, Building Data-Driven Internet of Things (IoT) Applications, today and learn:
- Why IoT demands new applications, continuous evolution, as well as support for higher volume and velocity of data. - How modifications to existing data architectures can provide organizations with new insights while transforming applications. - What tools and solutions are available to help businesses develop, iterate and mobilize data-driven IoT applications.
Pivotal is powering enterprise transformation by serving as a trusted IT partner to enterprises building, evolving, scaling and adapting IoT applications. Contact us <https://pivotal.io/contact> to learn how Pivotal can help advance your software-driven experiences.
Thanks, The Pivotal Team
